data.name: Bitcoin Hot
data.description:
Bitcoin Hot claims to be a fork of Bitcoin blockchain at block height 498848 with a new PoW algorithm, which is claimed to be an upgraded systems with large block size, quicker block interval and larger supply. It is claimed that Bitcoin Hot miners could begin creating blocks in the new block chain system with the original bitcoin blockchain system unaffected. It is further claimed that Bitcoin Hot new chain had distributed Bitcoin Hot to bitcoin owners with a scale of 100:1.
